publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-362 Margaret Mitchell: World Rowing Under 23 Championships—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers on the success of the 2007 World Rowing Under 23 Championships held at Strathclyde Country Park; notes that the international rowing event, which was supported by North Lanarkshire Council and others such as Event Scotland and Glasgow 2014, attracted competitors from 50 countries across the globe and showcased the fantastic facilities at the park, and further notes that the park’s rowing course, a potential training location for the London 2012 Olympic Games, is built and maintained to FISA Grade A requirements and has been upgraded to Britain’s first Olympic-standard 8-lane 2,000 metre course.

S3M-362 World Rowing Under 23 Championships (lodged on 14 August 2007) Jackie Baillie*, Jamie Stone*, Sandra White*, Ted Brocklebank*, Mary Scanlon*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Murdo Fraser*, Robin Harper*, Jamie McGrigor*, Jackson Carlaw*, Gil Paterson*, John Lamont*, Jamie Hepburn*, Karen Gillon*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-362 World Rowing Under 23 Championships (lodged on 14 August 2007) Annabel Goldie*
S3M-362 World Rowing Under 23 Championships (lodged on 14 August 2007) Derek Brownlee*
S3M-362 World Rowing Under 23 Championships (lodged on 14 August 2007) Cathie Craigie*
S3M-362 World Rowing Under 23 Championships (lodged on 14 August 2007) Jack McConnell*
